column1: Congratulations @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @DrBiden @DouglasEmhoff I know all American families will be safe in your hands. https://t.co/VVpFoVVa1E
Thank you so much Palm Beach County. I am grateful for your votes and support we accomplished this together. Now let’s get to work there’s a lot to do. https://t.co/EIYznieEO4
Thank you to everyone who has voted texted volunteered worked at the polls made calls spoke to their families and friends and just showed up. You voice matters and will be heard.

Palm Beach County: please note that all 4 drop boxes in 🗳️ Delray Beach (345 S. Congress Ave) 🗳️ Palm Beach Gardens (3188 PGA Blvd) 🗳️ Belle Glade (2976 State Road 15)  🗳️ as well as the West Palm Beach Main Office (240 S. Military Trail)  will now be available until 7 p.m.! https://t.co/prPLJTn0Rs

I have worked for positive change since my days as a student protester in the 1960s. I've been a community and civic leader state legislator mayor and now have the privilege to serve as your Member of Congress. I hope you will continue to trust me with your vote today.
¡Ve a votar Palm Beach! ¡Haz que se escuche tu voz!
🗳️ Si tiene algún problema mientras vota llame a la línea directa de protección electoral: 888-VE-Y-VOTA / (888)-839-8682.

🗳️ Hay algunas formas de llegar a los lugares de votación asignados de forma gratuita. Palm Tran Connection y el servicio Go Glades serán gratis hoy. Para planificar su viaje visite https://t.co/CymkqeREFA descargue la aplicación Palm Tran o llame al: (561) 841-4287.

🗳️ Visite el sitio web de PBC Elections con anticipación para confirmar su lugar de votación asignado ver su boleta de muestra y confirmar las cosas que necesita llevar con usted (por ejemplo su tarjeta de identificación) : https://t.co/oDR9vKH0k8

🗳️ Si aún tiene su boleta de voto por correo debe entregarla en persona en las oficinas del Supervisor de Elecciones. Todas las boletas deben recibirse antes de las 7 p.m. La oficina principal aceptará boletas hasta las 7 p.m. y las sucursales las aceptarán hasta las 5 p.m.
🗳️ Use sus máscaras protéjase y proteja a quienes lo rodean.
El día ha llegado.  🗳️ Las urnas están oficialmente abiertas 7 a.m. a 7 p.m. Si todavía está en línea a las 7 p.m. manténgase en línea.
Go vote Palm Beach County! Have your voice heard!
🗳️ If you have any issues while voting call the Election Protection Hotline: 866-OUR-VOTE / 866-687-8683.
🗳️ There are a few ways to get to your assigned polling site for free. Read about how here: https://t.co/ZCQnswajKY

🗳️ Check out the PBC Elections website ahead of time to confirm your assigned polling location view your sample ballot and confirm the things you need to bring with you (for example your ID). https://t.co/oDR9vKH0k8

🗳️ If you still have your vote by mail ballot you have to drop it off at the Supervisor of Elections offices. All ballots must be received by 7 pm. The main office will accept ballots until 7 pm and the branch offices will accept them until 5 pm.
🗳️ Wear your masks protect yourself and those around you.
The day is here.  🗳️ Polls are are officially open 7 am to 7 pm. If you are still in line at 7 pm stay in line. https://t.co/xCVuvMjsqB
Good Morning.
For a full list of all the endorsements I'm honored to have please check out my website https://t.co/zfXXHvIp4B

Thank you so much @1199SEIU for your endorsement! Your support means a lot. The work you do for the thousands of Florida workers in our state is vital and I look forward to continuing our work together! https://t.co/JaLNVLeBeb

We're almost there Election Day is tomorrow! If you will be voting please check the https://t.co/oDR9vKH0k8 website to plan ahead. Find your polling location as it may have changed view your sample ballot and confirm what you need to bring. Most importantly stay safe! https://t.co/xcxVM8Suu7

Access to good quality affordable health care is essential for all Americans. I have always fought for it and will continue to fight for it.  Check out my website to see the issues that mean the most to me https://t.co/83GnUzvybP

Tomorrow is the last day of Early Voting scary! If you are planning on voting in person don't miss the safest and fastest way to vote. If you still have your vote-by-mail ballot tomorrow is also the last day to drop off your ballot at any Early Voting site. Don't be tricked! https://t.co/yxNWoHagQM

📬 It is now too late to mail back your ballot. If you still have it please DROP IT OFF in person at any of the Early Voting Secure Drop Boxes or Mobile Van sites until November 1st. On Monday + Tuesday bring it to the SOE offices. For all information: https://t.co/Rxk6rwxTyo https://t.co/uZ0wfZAn5Z

I'm with @PeteButtigieg my son Ben who is a Marine veteran and multiple warriors talking about military families and the importance of voting for #BidenHarris2020 right now. Tune in to watch: https://t.co/Yp5vKPheYa

I'm honored to have received an "F" grade from the NRA.  Every day gun violence devastates families and destroys lives in the US. I know there is no magic wand to end gun violence but there are many responsible and common sense actions we can take to save lives. We must do them.

Ya es demasiado tarde para mandar tu boleta por correo. Si todavía tienes tu boleta déjela en cualquiera de los buzones seguros. Puedes encontrarlos aquí: https://t.co/kJKighrviR https://t.co/GSDgdWQwcB

As case numbers rise again we have to take it upon ourselves to protect each other. Please continue to wear masks wash your hands often and maintain distances. The @pbcgov's website has the latest county updates testing sites CDC guidelines and more: https://t.co/yuPpRdBI1g https://t.co/HlqVLNJaDp

I'm proud to be part of @FlaDems' #SunshineSlate☀️this election. It's a wonderful group of over 400 candidates who will protect reproductive rights for women fight for access to quality and affordable health care and most importantly will flip our state blue at every level! https://t.co/PRMTZNeetg

I'm grateful to the @ActiveRetirees for their endorsement. I will always fight to ensure that Americans have the secure retirement they have earned. I will remain a leader on issues such as strengthening and expanding Social Security and Medicare and protecting them from cuts. https://t.co/GuaBsrRmAh
I believe that Israel’s security is our security and Israel’s values are our values. I will continue to safeguard the critical bipartisan consensus on the U.S.-Israel relationship.

Today is the last day to request a Vote-By-Mail ballot. Since it is recommended to mail your ballot back at least 10 days before the election if you will be requesting your ballot today please drop it off at any secure Early Voting location once you complete it. https://t.co/eW9haOLrS5

Por favor tengan cuidado al ir a votar los votantes en Lantana Road han informado que se están repartiendo estas tarjetas con recomendaciones Demócratas FALSAS. En la línea de Distrito 21 han reemplazado mi nombre con el de la candidata Republicana. https://t.co/iVphyyUxk4

In order to make sure your ballot is counted on time you should mail it back at least 10 days before the election. That means that if you still have your vote-by-mail ballot you should complete it and mail it no later than TODAY. https://t.co/y7Ac6A7pnW
@jaketapper I'm running against her. https://t.co/Lupsovyx1Z
https://t.co/Lupsovyx1Z

We're aware of the deceptive flyers going around and have shared it with the necessary leadership.   Thank you to everyone who informed us. The best way to fight back against these malicious wrongdoings is to get out and vote. We appreciate all your support.

Today I’m joining Biden's National Political Director @ewilson215 for a #TeamJoeTalks! Tune in to the conversation as we discuss what we’re up to and how you can get involved in the 2020 election. https://t.co/i9tWWalw89

I'm looking forward to doing a #TeamJoeTalks with Biden's National Political Director @ewilson215 today at 12:45 PM. Hope you'll tune in right here while we talk about what's at stake this election and how you can join us. https://t.co/jmA7H0ERaM

Thank you @NewtownAction for your endorsement! I am proud to join to you in advocating for bold and comprehensive gun safety legislation so we can dramatically reduce all forms of gun violence in our nation. #VoteGunSafety2020 https://t.co/Tw2alqk3Sc

Palm Beach County: Votar temprano es la forma más segura de votar en persona. Podrá votar en cualquier sitio de votación anticipada. Encuentre una lista completa de los lugares disponibles los tiempos de espera la información sobre qué traer y más en: https://t.co/D29zBQXArY https://t.co/wKP7iPoj25
✉️ If you still have your completed vote-by-mail ballot you will also be able to drop them off in person at any of the secure drop boxes or mobile vans at the open Early Voting sites.

🗳️ Early Voting in Florida starts TOMORROW! Early Voting is the safest way to vote in person. You will be able to vote at any open Early Voting site near you. Find a full list of available locations wait times information on what to bring and more at: https://t.co/D29zBQXArY https://t.co/HMOWTN2zHP

It is an honor to receive the Florida State Association of Letter Carriers' endorsement for re-election. I will always be a champion and friend of not only the 18300+ letter carriers across Florida but also to the 290000 active and retired letter carriers across the country. https://t.co/ZY2dfRjaUZ
As the mother of a United States Marine war veteran I will always be a loud voice and leading force to protect and improve the lives of our veterans.

Through education grassroots organizing and coalition building we are changing Florida so that no one suffers harassment or discrimination on the basis of their sexual orientation or gender identity. Couldn't agree more @EqualityFl.   Your endorsement means a lot! https://t.co/ev7VGi7n06

This administration has worked to turn back the clock on women and families and have repeatedly attacked women’s reproductive rights and health care. I will stand strong against anyone who attacks these basic rights and essential programs.

Talk is cheap; Frankel works. In this contest the incumbent is the clear and only choice.   I'm grateful to the @pbpost for their endorsement! Read the full article here: https://t.co/9AgN12wn4W https://t.co/o2PTsNtCI3
Thank you for your endorsement NASW-PACE! It's an honor to have your support. https://t.co/iPjAECossW
To deny the Holocaust is unacceptable - it tragically happened and having an educator in our schools deny it is inexplicable #NeverAgain https://t.co/1XGxJLcEfw

I believe Floridians deserve access to a quality public education and opportunities to further their higher education without burdensome debt.   I have always voted to support that and always will which is why I've earned an ‘A’ rating from the National Education Association 🍎

Last week I mailed back my Vote By Mail ballot and was able to track it all on the https://t.co/D29zBQXArY website. I’m happy to say it was already received!   Voting by mail is safe and easy. Follow these steps when you receive your ballot to make sure it is counted on time. https://t.co/GhnhZ1Qbow

So proud of PBC’s own @taliarach for representing our community around the country with her role as Elphaba in the National Tour of Wicked!   Check her out in the video below with some special guests on the importance of using your voting power for good 💚 https://t.co/ypLYys5AyV
If you had an issue registering to vote or updating your registration yesterday you still have until today at 7 PM to do it! Don't miss your chance to have your voice heard. https://t.co/UqvwbRizb2

The way we treat animals as individuals and as a nation is a measure of our decency. Well said @AWAction_News.   I'm proud to receive the Animal Wellness Action's endorsement for re-election! https://t.co/iReoI84xrE

I am sending the President and First Lady my wishes for a swift recovery.   Please continue to wear masks maintain your distance stay home if you are ill and follow all CDC guidelines. Protect yourself and your loved ones around you.

Thank you @evtrust for your endorsement. I've worked with the entire Florida delegation to champion Everglades restoration projects. The Everglades are home to an extraordinary natural habitat and the water supply of over 7 million Floridians. I will always fight to protect it. https://t.co/BR4h6Iowni

I'm grateful to have the support of the @HRC PAC for my re-election. The Human Rights Campaign will always have my support as I continue the fight towards equality and towards comprehensive equal rights legislation at the federal level. https://t.co/FCtRE6kuDe https://t.co/sRF5gWN5RU

Today's announcement from the Governor is reckless. The administration wants to pretend the virus is over but that could not be further from the truth.   You can still do your part to protect yourself and your loved ones. Please continue to wear masks and maintain your distance. https://t.co/OTWGFLLnU9

Once you received your ballot follow all the instructions for your vote to be counted:  - Fill out the bubbles entirely  - Place the ballot in the secrecy sleeve  - Sign the envelope  - Mail it back as soon as possible!
Vote-By-Mail ballots in Palm Beach County will be mailed out starting TODAY! If you've requested one make sure to keep an eye out for them. #VoteReady https://t.co/AFhe5CzlHv

📝 You have ONE WEEK left to fill out the Census!  It only takes about 10 minutes but the results will impact Palm Beach County for 10 years. The funding for our community's schools hospitals and infrastructure all come from the results. Do it now: https://t.co/flwtUOO84g

I'm very grateful to receive the @NASW - Political Action for Candidate Election's endorsement for re-election. Social Work is a noble profession and I look forward to working together to promote health welfare and education for all individuals and families. https://t.co/OYXBSktSzh

No better day than #NationalVoterRegistrationDay to complete the first step in our Voting Checklist.   Your vote matters. Make a plan to vote so your ballot is counted on time!   Register right now at: https://t.co/oDR9vKH0k8 https://t.co/2w3Raxc4Wu

Today in honor of African American Small Business Monday African American Mayors Statewide are joining in to show their support of the @JoeBiden-@KamalaHarris Ticket!   Join Miami Gardens Mayor Oliver Gilbert today at 6 PM: https://t.co/x8TJsvQkfI
Happy first day of in-person schooling here in Palm Beach County. I hope all teachers students school staff and parents have a safe and positive learning experience. 🍎#GoingTheDistancePBCSD

This weekend we lost Ruth Bader Ginsburg a true champion for equality and justice. She died on Rosh Hashanah which for the Jewish tradition means she is a “Person of Great Righteousness”. Indeed she was and our country will miss her. May her memory be a blessing.
L'Shanah Tovah to all my fellow Jewish neighbors. Our celebrations may look different this year but the message is the same. I am hoping for a sweet and healthy New Year for all of us. Happy 5781! 🍎🍯

Happy #HispanicHeritageMonth! This month and always we recognize and respect the history culture and accomplishments of the Hispanic community.  ¡Feliz #MesdelaHerenciaHispana! Este mes y siempre reconocemos y respetamos la historia cultura y logros de la comunidad hispana.

We need more women’s voices in positions of power. This is why I work tirelessly to help get women elected to office as a co-chair of both Elect Democratic Women and WomenLEAD.  Both here at home and around the world I believe that when women succeed society succeeds.

Happy First Day of School to all our students teachers parents school staff and everyone who is part of our schools! I know this beginning of the year may look different but @PBCSD has prepared a great year ahead. 🍎 #GoingTheDistancePBCSD

Typically I celebrate my constituents and our community when we're on the national stage but unfortunately there just isn’t much to celebrate right now. Donald Trump's #RNC2020 speech is a distraction from the 170000 Americans that have died as a result of the pandemic.

Tomorrow I will be part of the Jewish Floridians Summit with @DouglasEmhoff and my neighbors @DWStweets and @TedDeutch. I hope you will join us from 1 pm - 2 pm! #BidenForFL Sign up now: https://t.co/2d6pD4410j https://t.co/zq2FPGYJLQ

Tonight my constituent will be speaking at the #RNC2020. I expect to hear a lot of lies and scare tactics from him though because that's right my constituent is Donald Trump.   We need a plan to end this pandemic which Joe Biden has. Text VOTE to 30330 now to join him. https://t.co/pAxyrPQi3P

Thank you to all the people across the country who have expressed their support for me in this race. We will win this together.

As your Congresswoman I have always been on your side. Always. I hope you will trust me today to continue being on your side.
